Method Detail

solveQuadrEq

static double[] solveQuadrEq(double a,
                             double b,
                             double c)
Solves a quadratic equation a * x^2 + b * x + c

Parameters:
a - Scalar factor of the quadratic term.
b - Scalar factor of the linear term.
c - Constant of the equation.
Returns:
Double vector of size 0, 1 or 2 according to the number of solutions. Element 0 of the return vector is always the smallest possible solution!
